'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{poe2}}.

==Background==
This vast cavern is the domain of [[Jadaferlas the Ancient]], the fire dragon that serves Magran and the Rathun.

==Points of interest==
* A straightforward approach. Past the oozes and fire blights, you come upon the sacrificial site to Jaga and then the fire dragon herself.
* {{legacy|poe1}} After approaching Jadaferlas, you will have a soul vision with [[Galawain]]. If you promised to "distribute the essence to existing souls in Dyrwood to strengthen them" in [[Council of Stars]] during the events of {{poe1}}, and then when interacting with the soul machine in [[Sun in Shadow]] during [[Memories of the Ancients]] you:
** Broke your promise →  Jadaferlas gains [[Galawain's Wrath]] (+10 [[Accuracy]], +4 [[Penetration]], +50% Damage with Weapons), making her stronger.
** Kept your promise → Jadaferlas gains [[Galawain's Favor]] (-10 [[Accuracy]], -2 [[Penetration]], -25% Damage with Weapons), making her weaker.

==Characters==
* [[Jadaferlas the Ancient]], fire dragon.

==Loot==
* [[Aldris Blade of Captain Crow]], [[Ajamuut's Stalking Cloak]]: In the dragon's hoard.
